about.title: about
description: I'm an IT undergraduate at General Sir John Kotelawala Defence University in Sri Lanka. I'm passionate about software development, web technologies, and learning new programming languages.

Currently building my skills through university coursework and personal projects. I enjoy solving coding challenges and turning ideas into functional applications. Always eager to learn and grow in the tech industry.

contacts.title: contacts
contacts.text: I'm interested in internship opportunities and learning experiences. Feel free to reach out for collaboration or questions

description: I'm an IT undergraduate at KDU University in Sri Lanka, passionate about software development and web technologies. Currently learning programming, database management, and network systems.
As a student, I'm building my skills through coursework projects and self-learning. I'm eager to apply my knowledge in real-world scenarios and continue growing in the tech industry.

facts.title: fun-facts
list: I have a passion for web development
